Description: Press the button over three stages, with up and down presses in between. Tags: 3-button, up, down, hexagon, 3-leds
Name: Bamboozling Directional Button

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about the number of presses required in any stage, or the colors of the up and down buttons at any stage, or the colors and label of the main button in any press of any stage.
